newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - May 29.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - May 29.

text.p: The following stories appeared in Thursday's Daily Variety:
* Universal Studios' parent Seagram Co Ltd sold over half of its 11 percent stake in Time Warner Inc for about $1.39 billion.
* Cameron Crowe, who wrote, produced and directed the TriStar Pictures film, "Jerry Maguire," has signed a three-year deal with DreamWorks SKG.
* The cast and producers of "ER" are working on a plan to open next season with a live episode.
* Canal Plus and Pathe-Cinema, have teamed up to create a European film distribution network.

* Representatives for studios and the Writers Guild of America are set to hold so-called "fast track" negotiations in an effort to craft a new contract well before the current agreement's May 1, 1998, expiration date.
